name: Joseph's Adventures (Joseph) (Joseph)
description:
STORY:

There was an average high school student called Joseph, he fell in love with a girl in his class,  she didn't seem to be interested in him at all, but he was willing to do anything to make her love him. It's going to be hard with all the problems he has to deal with every day not alone but with his two best friends Henry and Jack who will help him a lot during his adventure.

FEATURES:

-A huge map to explore

-8 hours of gameplay

-Side missions and a lot of secrets to find

-6 mini-games

-A lot of achievements to unlock

-Time system: There are 4 periods in this game (morning, day, evening, and night)

-Hunger system: The player gets hungry over time

CONTROLS:

-Movement controls: W A S D or arrow keys

-Interact: SPACE or ENTER

-Run: SHIFT

-Sprint: Hold  SHIFT and when the sprint icon appears on the screen press the SPACE button (After unlocking the sprint ability)

Menu: ESC

Fast forward: Hold SPACE
